message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its unique value, I believe a starting price of $1,900,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $1,500,000?

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer.  While I'm motivated to sell, $1,500,000 is lower than I'm comfortable with. Could we agree on $1,700,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $1,600,000?
